item.title: Project 0
item.description: project-home-page summary of instructions # setup: the puzzle # : the actual puzzle is a grid of empty square cells (the board) and a set of a number of pieces that are in the form of a configuration of those sqaure cell blocks (one's hand) - after each piece is placed, any cells that have been filled are cleared - after all the pieces in one’s hand are placed, it is refilled with the same number of pieces as before - play continues until none of the pieces in the hand can fit anywhere on the board
